text: Dahi dangada ga hanimoi gi di hale tangada maluagina, gei taane maluagina deelaa hagalee hiihai e daaligi di manu i ana manu donu bolo e hai dana hagamiami gi tangada dela ne hanimoi. Mee gaa daa tama siibi tangada hagaloale, ga daaligi, gaa hai ai dana hagamiami gi tangada dela ne hanimoi gi dono hale.”
